articles.author: Winnie Hsu, Sujata Rao
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for May 22 - Bloomberg
articles.description: European stocks fell and bond yields rose after the latest price data from the UK cast doubt on hopes that prices pressures have been vanquished.
articles.content:
European stocks fell and bond yields rose after the latest price data from the UK cast doubt on hopes that prices pressures have been vanquished.
